comment.body:
> [nofish](#comment_59_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Yes, if you have'nt modified the css/js:
> 
> Backup your site's directory
> Copy everything from data/1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8 to your site's directory except content.json and data directory.

that's cool.

> [musickiller](#comment_1_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): that's cool.

damn. backup, backup backup!!! >.< I hate myself sometimes...
I think I've killed my blog.. again xD
Man, even 60 MB was spectacular enough, but 24? It's crazy cool xD
